reviews.review_msg: Kind-hearted instructor who is extremely knowledgeable. A bit disorganized in lecture. Do the readings or else you will be totally lost. Her lecture topics were quite specific. Overall, a good instructor with a surprisingly sly sense of humour.
A wonderful woman and a great professor.
Brilliant professor, interesting material with current references. Excellent discussion leader and a fair marker. Read or at least lookup the material, contribute and you'll be golden.

I'm not sure what you guys are on about. This professor is worthless, she almost never teaches but relies on group work to suck up class time. She allows complete morons to ramble on. Her assignments are as clear as mud. The final was BRUTAL and she claims that you only need 3 hours to write it. Never again.
